content: It was not the original
ILOVE THIS APP!!
Mercer Meyer amazing

My first look at this story was in the mid 90's when Living Books made the Windows 3.1 version. My children learned to use a mouse with this program. This app is not as interactive as the Living Book version from 1993! I would like a machine that would play that old CD. It would be a winner on any platform.
Was hoping that it's the same as the original but it's not. The only interaction is that words flash when you tap on an element..
This is not like the original, no options to explore the pics with hidden extras.
Readalong
Great read
Love it!!Read it with my GrandchildrenðŸ˜€

So sweet. My grandson enjoy it very much, he loves it when I read to him cause of all the funny noises I do. Also it's great cause you don't have to carry so many books when you are on a road trip. Everything is right in your little ipad.  ðŸ˜Š
Still no animations
Good old memories!
Brilliant. As are all the OM apps we ve got. Keep up the good work.
My grandson loves this
Always great!
Awesome
Love it!!!!!!
I used to love thses books as a kid. I do miss the animations from the pc version.
This was my kids favorite computer book. The clickable animated objects were what kept them coming back. Nothing in this app story is clickable. Sad
I bought this app for my grandchildren, they love it! It's been the best on the go book ever!
Not as cool as the original version where you could tap something and it would animate. This adaptation of the pc version is bad and kids get bored.
Couldn't return after 10 min. This is crap compared to PC version. An utter disappointment. No animations at all. Online license check? Jeez.
I bought many of the Little Critter and Dr. Seuss books for my daughter. They're the BEST. So adorable and interactive. Worth every penny!
Very Good. I bought thee whole series. But why there is no way to quit the app? Press Home will just leave it at the background and take up memory...
For people having the message about it being unlicensed: click on "buy" which will take you to the market where it is purchased, click the open button
